sentences.sContent: A good dish, either smelly or tasty should be pleasant in gustatory sense, and thus stimulates the appetite.
sentences.sContent_eng: A good dish, either smelly or tasty should be pleasant in gustatory sense, and thus stimulates the appetite.
sentences.sCn: 成功的菜肴在嗅觉上不论是香还是臭，但在味感上是美好的，同样会引起人们的食欲。

sentences.sContent: Human mind constantly depend on objects which are taken from visual, auditory, olfactory, gustatory and tactile means.
sentences.sContent_eng: Human mind constantly depend on objects which are taken from visual, auditory, olfactory, gustatory and tactile means.
sentences.sCn: 人的心理不断地依赖于从视觉，听觉，嗅觉，味觉和触觉得到的目标。 ₰。

sentences.sContent: Flavor is a combined impression of all the gustatory (taste bud) sensations and retro nasal aromasthat go from mouth to nose.
sentences.sContent_eng: Flavor is a combined impression of all the gustatory (taste bud) sensations and retro nasal aromasthat go from mouth to nose.
sentences.sCn: 风味是所有味觉（味蕾）感觉和从口腔到鼻子的鼻后香气的组合印象。

remMethod.val: 来自gustation(n. 味觉； 品尝)
